verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass after many<WH7227> days,<WH3117> that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Elijah<WH452> in the third<WH7992> year,<WH8141> saying,<WH559> Go,<WH3212> show<WH7200> yourself to Ahab;<WH256> and I will send<WH5414> rain<WH4306> on the earth.<WH127>
